meanings.sent1: She kept miscopying the numbers in her math homework.
meanings.sent2: The student realized he was miscopying the notes from the board.
meanings.sent3: The miscopying of the recipe led to a disastrous cake.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a broken mirror, constantly miscopying the images.
meanings.sent5: The detective's miscopying of the evidence almost cost him the case.

meanings.definition: An act of copying something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The miscopying of the document caused confusion in the office.
meanings.sent2: He discovered a miscopying in the report that changed the conclusion.
meanings.sent3: The miscopying of the map made the treasure hunt more challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a maze of miscopying, leading to constant errors.
meanings.sent5: The miscopying of the contract resulted in a legal dispute.
